synopsis.text: Song, promise, and passion unite in the captivating world of BanG Dream! as the all-girl band Roselia embarks on a thrilling journey to reach the coveted stage of 'FES.' Led by the determined Yukina Minato, each member brings their unique convictions and talents to the group. As they navigate the challenges of forming a band and honing their skills, the girls make an unbreakable promise to each other. Over the next two years, fans can look forward to three theatrical films following Roselia's journey, with BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia I: Yakusoku (Promise) and BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia II: Song I am. set to premiere in Japan in 2021. Witness the unforgettable story of Roselia's rise to the top and the unwavering bond between its members as they strive for greatness in the world of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
